name: Close your eyes (itch) (valky_n)
description:
# What is it

Close your eyes is a narrative game submitted to LD48.

We are beginners, please indulge this unfinished game. We welcome all feedbacks and critics, please test and comment !

We made a WebGL build so that people could test it directly on there browsers.

# How to play the game

If available, please use good headphones or monitors, we invested a lot of our time in audio assets.

The game should be available on Itch.io here: LINK

We open sourced the game on github: LINK

# More info

We're coworkers, We made our own assets, music, models and textures.

# Tools we used:

* Unity 3d

* Blender

* Ardour

* Ableton Live

* Audacity

* Gimp

* Xanax
